property Rgas
Compute the mass-specific gas constant of the molecule:
Rgas = R / MM

__eq__(otherSpecie)[source]

Two chemical specie are equal if they have same name, the same atomic specie (with same names), and the same thermodynamic properties.

__getitem__(atom)[source]

atom: str / Atom / int

Get the data relative to Atom in the Molecule

-> If str: checking for atom matching the name -> If Atom: checking for atomic specie -> If int: checing for entry following the order

Return: MoleculeItem

__iter__()[source]

Iteration over the atoms in the molecule.

property MM
Compute the molecular mass of the chemical specie.
bruteFormula()[source]

Returns the brute formula of the specie

atomList()[source]

Returns a list<Atom> containing a list of the atomic specie contained in the chemical specie.

atomicCompositionMatrix()[source]

Return a 1xN numpy.ndarray with the atomic composition matrix of the molecule, where N is the number of atoms in the molecule. Each element of the matrix is the number of atoms of the atomic specie in the mixture, sorted according to their order in ‘atoms’ array.

setName(value)[source]

Set the name of the specie.
